divs: sighting details i traveled up to a vantage point at la luz trail head and acquired telescope video of this ufo traveling over the desert west of albuquerque. it went back and forth in a north-south pattern for over an hour. i would point the telescope where i thought it would pass through the fov. this requires good alignment of the spotting telescope and the newtonian reflector. it could not be seen if you were not high up on the side of sandia mountain. the clip i have included is the space vehicle as recorded by the telescope without any processing. if you follow the link to my youtube site you can see the entire video. i have tracked the object through each frame and removed the linear movement as best that i could. i increased the contrast and reduced the brightness you that you could see inside the plasma. i then applied a high frequency pass filter to increase the high spatial frequencies. residual vibration is evident due to a "corkscrew" like motion that is superimposed on the linear motion. this is quite noticeable in the last part of the video. i have also included a link to some stills on myspace that show a good example of a unified field plasma exhibiting this corkscrew like motion. this is most likely due to spiraling around the earths magnetic field lines as it moves forward. frederick portigal, abq full ufo video on youtube: http:\\youtube.com\watch?v=-k_envshcbi example of "corkscrew" motion on myspace: http:\\viewmorepics.myspace.com\index.cfm?fuseaction=viewimage&friendid=314091968&albumid=305152&imageid=273699
